assetsPositions.description: assetsPositions[i] is the number of shares of the asset i in the portfolio

assetsWeights.description: assetsWeights[i] is the weight of the asset i in the portfolio, in percentage

portfolioTrackingError.description: The tracking error of the portfolio

portfolioSharpeRatio.description: The Sharpe ratio of the portfolio

portfolioAverageReturn.description: The arithmetic average return of the portfolio

portfolioReturn.description: The arithmetic return of the portfolio

assetsWeights.description: assetsWeights[i] is the weight of the asset i in the portfolio, in percentage

portfolioReturn.description: The arithmetic return of the portfolio

assetsWeights.description: assetsWeights[i] is the weight of the asset i in the portfolio, in percentage

portfolioReturn.description: The arithmetic return of the portfolio

portfolioAlpha.description: The portfolio alpha, which correponds to the portion of the portfolio returns that cannot be explained by the portfolio factor exposures

portfolioBetas.description: The portfolio betas, which correspond to the portfolio factor exposures

portfolioRSquared.description: The portfolio R^2, which indicates how much of the variability in the portfolio returns can be explained by the portfolio factor exposures; generally, the higher the R^2 the better the portfolio factor exposures explain the portfolio returns

portfolioDrawdowns.description: portfolioDrawdowns[t] is the value of the drawdown function at the time t

portfolioDiversificationRatio.description: The diversification ratio of the portfolio

assetsGroupsRiskContributions.description: assetsGroupsRiskContributions[k] is the risk contribution of the group of assets k to the risk of the portfolio

assetsRiskContributions.description: assetsRiskContributions[i] is the risk contribution of the asset i to the risk of the portfolio

assetsGroupsReturnContributions.description: assetsGroupsReturnContributions[k] is the return contribution of the group of assets k to the return of the portfolio

assetsReturnContributions.description: assetsReturnContributions[i] is the return contribution of the asset i to the return of the portfolio

portfolioBeta.description: The portfolio beta, which correponds to the portfolio systematic risk in the Capital Asset Pricing Model (CAPM)

portfolioAlpha.description: The portfolio Jensen's alpha, which correponds to the portfolio excess return adjusted for the systematic risk in the Capital Asset Pricing Model (CAPM)

residualizedFactorReturns.description: residualizedFactorReturns[t] is the return of the residualized factor at the time t

assetVolatility.description: The sample volatility of the asset

assetVariance.description: The sample variance of the asset

assetAverageReturn.description: The arithmetic average return of the asset

assetReturns.description: assetReturns[t] is the arithmetic return of the asset from the time t-1 to the time t, in percentage

message.description: Indicates whether the matrix is a valid covariance matrix
enum: invalid covariance matrix - non symmetric matrix
invalid covariance matrix - non positive diagonal elements
invalid covariance matrix - non positive semi-definite matrix

assetsCovarianceMatrix.description: assetsCovarianceMatrix[i][j] is the sample covariance between the asset i returns and the asset j returns
assetsCovarianceMatrix[i][j] is the covariance between the asset i and the asset j

message.description: Indicates whether the matrix is a valid correlation matrix
enum: invalid correlation matrix - non symmetric matrix
invalid correlation matrix - non positive diagonal elements
invalid correlation matrix - non positive semi-definite matrix

assetsCorrelationMatrix.description: assetsCorrelationMatrix[i][j] is the correlation between the asset i and the asset j
assetsCorrelationMatrix[i][j] is the correlation between the asset i and the asset j
assetsCorrelationMatrix[i][j] is the correlation between the asset i and the asset j
